title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Publish Tiddler
readme: * Publish Tiddler Manager * not save storylist to html * support Publish or not manager !! NOTE * 此插件重写 [[FileSystem Tid|$:/config/FileSystemPaths]] * 虽然此插件兼容单文件 tiddlywiki, 但是只工作在 Node.js tiddlywiki * maybe should use public is more understandable better publish !! TODO * use viewtoolbar replace template * add plugin work details with tiddlywiki * enable only dev * maybe should use stattiddler to use http * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/plugins/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler]] * [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw]]
